mapper.select: SELECT t1.FBANKACNTID, t1.FNUMBER, t1.FMODIFYDATE, t2.FNAME FROM T_CN_BANKACNT t1, T_CN_BANKACNT_L t2 WHERE t1.FBANKACNTID = t2.FBANKACNTID
SELECT t1.FBANKACNTID, t1.FNUMBER, t1.FMODIFYDATE, t2.FNAME FROM T_CN_BANKACNT t1, T_CN_BANKACNT_L t2 WHERE t1.FBANKACNTID = t2.FBANKACNTID AND t1.FMODIFYDATE > #{maxOutDate}
